SELECT a.*, f.name AS formName, e.* FROM approval a JOIN approval_form f ON a.approvalformid = f.id JOIN employee e ON a.employeeid = e.id WHERE (#{form, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR f.name = #{form}) AND (#{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR a.state = #{state}) AND (#{drafter, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR e.name LIKE '%' || #{drafter} || '%') AND (#{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} IS NULL OR a.regdate >= #{startDate}) AND (#{endDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} IS NULL OR #{endDate}>=a.regdate)
